tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE EmployeeSchedule (
    employee_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    schedule_date DATE,
    shift_start_time TIME,
    shift_end_time TIME,
    meal_break_start_time TIME,
    meal_break_end_time TIME
);

CREATE TABLE WorkSchedule (
    schedule_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    employee_id INT,
    date DATE,
    start_time TIME,
    end_time TIME
);
CREATE TABLE employees (    employee_id INT PRIMARY KEY,    name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,    position VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,    hourly_rate DECIMAL(10, 2) NOT NULL );
CREATE TABLE shifts (    shift_id INT PRIMARY KEY,    shift_date DATE NOT NULL,    start_time TIME NOT NULL,    end_time TIME NOT NULL,    employee_id INT REFERENCES employees(employee_id) );

CREATE TABLE payroll (    payroll_id INT PRIMARY KEY,    pay_date DATE NOT NULL,    employee_id INT REFERENCES employees(employee_id),    hours_worked DECIMAL(5, 2) NOT NULL,    total_pay DECIMAL(10, 2) NOT NULL );

CREATE TABLE employees (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    name VARCHAR(255),
    position VARCHAR(255),
    hourly_rate DECIMAL(10, 2)
)

CREATE TABLE schedules (
    schedule_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    employee_id INT,
    event_date DATE,
    start_time TIME,
    end_time TIME
)

CREATE TABLE events (
    event_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    event_name VARCHAR(255),
    event_date DATE,
    location VARCHAR(255)
)

CREATE TABLE payroll (
    payroll_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    employee_id INT,
    pay_date DATE,
    hours_worked DECIMAL(5, 2),
    total_pay DECIMAL(10, 2)
)

CREATE TABLE payroll (
 payroll_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
 employee_id INT,
 pay_date DATE,
 total_hours DECIMAL(5,2),
 total_pay DECIMAL(10,2)
);
